Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('L1','C1','C2','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] < 0.1)
ShortName: Beta value must be >= 0.1 - Consider using a lower DP to achieve a larger Beta or consider using a larger line size.
Beta must be <= 0.316 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a smaller line size. Please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C2','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.75)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.75 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a smaller line size. Please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('E1','E2','E3','S2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] < 0.46)
ShortName: Beta value must be >= 0.46 - Consider using a lower DP to achieve a larger Beta or consider using a larger line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('E1','E2','E3','S2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.84)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.84 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a smaller line size. Please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] < 0.245)
ShortName: Beta value must be >= 0.245 - Consider using a lower DP to achieve a larger Beta or consider using a larger line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.6)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.6 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a smaller line size. Please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.
Integral RTJ plates require support diameter to be specified.
Integral RTJ plates require support diameter to be specified.
Support diameter not necessary (ID is used). Screwed RTJ plates are supported at PCD of webbing.
Support diameter not necessary (ID is used). Screwed RTJ plates are supported at PCD of webbing.

Notes: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (concentric:corner or D D/2) minimum B<56
Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] <= 0.56) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 5000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with corner or (D + D/2) taps with Beta <= 0.56, Reynolds number must be >= 5000 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Notes: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (concentric:corner or D D/2) minimum B>56
Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.56) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 16000 * [Beta] * [Beta])
ShortName: For Concentric plates with corner or (D + D/2) taps with Beta > 0.56, Reynolds number must be <= 16000*Beta² - Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

For Concentric plates with flange taps, Reynolds number must be >= 5000 -  Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='C2') AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 170 * [Beta] * [Beta] * [PipeID]{length,PipeIDUnits} * 1000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with flange taps, Reynolds number must be >= 170 * Beta² * PipeID (in mm) - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < (200000 * [Beta] * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Segmental & Eccentric plates, Reynolds number must be >= 200000 * Beta² - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] > (1000000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Segmental & Eccentric plates, Reynolds number must be <= 1000000 * Beta - Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] > (100000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Quarter Circle plates, Reynolds number must be < 100000*Beta- Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < ((1000 * [Beta]) + (9400000 * ([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24))))
ShortName: For Quarter Circle plates, Reynolds number must be >= 1000*Beta + 9.4E6*(Beta-0.24)^8 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

For Conical Entrance plates, Reynolds number must be >80 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='L1') AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] > (200000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Conical Entrance plates, Reynolds number must be <200000 * Beta - Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Notes: Beta/Reynolds @ normal/Design (concentric:corner or D D/2)  minimum B<56

ShortName: For Concentric plates with corner or (D + D/2) taps with Beta <= 0.56, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be >= 5000 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

ShortName: For Concentric plates with Flange taps, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be >= 170 * Beta² * PipeID (in mm)

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] < (200000 * [Beta] * [Beta]))

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] > (1000000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Segmental & Eccentric plates, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be <= 1000000 * Beta - Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] < ((1000 * [Beta]) + (9400000 * ([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24))))
ShortName: For Quarter Circle plates, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be >= 1000*Beta + 9.4E6*(Beta-0.24)^8 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Notes: Small bore and Design = C1, C2, C3

Notes: Small bore and Design = U1, U2

ShortName: For Quarter Circle plates, machined bore must be greater than 15 mm.

For Segmental plates, machined bore must be greater than 50 mm.

Inclined Up TG2 - Please consider your tapping orientation selection - Inclined up is recommended for all gas applications to ensure condensate drains back into the pipe and does not collect in impulse pipes.
Horizontal TG3 - Please consider your tapping orientation - Recommended for all steam applications.
Inclined Down TG4 - Please consider your tapping orientation - Recommended for all liquid applications to ensure gas vents back into the pipe and does not collect in impulse pipes.
As no minimum flow has been provided turndown checks will not be completed.

Flow measurement range “Turndown” is greater than 4:1. We recommend that you ensure that any transmitter used with this meter will have sufficient accuracy at your specified Normal and Minimum flowrates.

Reynolds number is greater than the limit 100,000,000 for any type of differential pressure flow metering. No other type of flow meter in this software package is suitable for such a condition. Please check the accuracy of the input data, consider decreasing the reynolds number by increasing the line size.
Note: DP is low - check transmitter suitable for these conditions.
Pipe design pressure must be greater than operating pressure.
Isentropic index out of normal range.
